name: Big Al's
description: Combination arcade, bowling alley, and sports bar, main arcade open to all ages. Staff are friendly and games are *generally* better maintained than some of the other local arcades.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Great 8/1: Flippers are weak, but otherwise plays fairly well.

machine_conditions.comment: Great 8/1: Flippers are weak, but otherwise plays fairly well.
Plays ok but needs a tune up and clean up.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Moderate 8/1: Flippers are angled higher than they should be, will throw off your aiming. Iron Monger doesn't register all shots made to it.

machine_conditions.comment: Moderate 8/1: Flippers are angled higher than they should be, will throw off your aiming. Iron Monger doesn't register all shots made to it.
Flippers really need a rebuild.  Very spongy, slow playing game.  All high scores are defaults.
Middle spinner not working as well...lost out on millions of points. Best feature of this machine is low replay score!

flippers are weak. machine is in rough looking condition.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Running smooth

machine_conditions.comment: Running smooth
All fixed up -z

Ball gets stuck sometimes on the right side of the A-lane at the top, right by the light.  It looks like that lane guide needs to be switched with the one on the left side to fix it, because that one has plastic on both sides.  The B-lane guides are correct.  

Rubber on right slingshot is not in the post correctly.

Coin mechs are picky about taking quarters.

Even with those small issues, it's a treat to be able to play this great game.

description: Local arcade with a mix of games from many eras from modern to retro, many games are 25 cents. Pinball is by the video games in the back, along the half wall on the right.
